column5: Got a couple Hoochies (squids) to try behind my dodger. There must be a way to tie them myself. Anyone have any patterns or pictures of hand-tied ones? I was thinking with some bucktail and crystal flash I could whip one up. Its more rewarding to have success on something you've made with your own hands. Know what I mean? I tried to look for patterns online.... but put "Hoochie" in a search and you can imagine what you get!
Create your own pattern.  If it really works, you could sell 'em (or just have excellent fishing until others figure it out on their own).
